name: Labyrinth Of Umbra
description:
Time to crawl into a creepy dungeon to get candy! About the game

Labyrinth of umbra is an attempt at creating a 3d procedurally generated dungeon crawler in RPG maker.
Features an OST with two whole original songs (wow!) as well as custom SFX/VFX, monsters and a procedurally generated dungeon that's more or less unique each time.

This game was made as an entry for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023.

Controls:
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to accept/interact
  • X to cancel/open inventory
  • Arrow keys to select target in battle (both for items and skills)
